searchBundleByVaccineCode

Parameter vaccine-code:token

Search for a bundle containing Immunization resource with specified vaccineCode

ResourceBundle
ExpressionBundle.entry.resource.ofType(Immunization).vaccineCode
Multiples
  • multipleAnd: It's up to the server whether the parameter may repeat in order to specify multiple values that must all be true
  • multipleOr: It's up to the server whether the parameter can have multiple values (separated by comma) where at least one must be true

name: searchBundleByVaccineCode
description: Search for a bundle containing Immunization resource with specified vaccineCode
